name: Sourdough Bread
description: Crusty and chewy artisan sourdough loaf, fermented for 24 hours.

name: Croissant
description: Flaky, buttery French pastry perfect for breakfast or a snack.

name: Chocolate Muffin
description: Rich and moist chocolate muffin with a gooey center.

name: Cinnamon Roll
description: Soft dough spiraled with cinnamon sugar and topped with vanilla glaze.

name: Baguette
description: Classic French baguette with a crisp crust and fluffy interior.

name: Blueberry Danish
description: Pastry filled with blueberry compote and a hint of cream cheese.

name: Carrot Cake Slice
description: Spiced carrot cake with cream cheese frosting and walnut topping.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
description: Chewy cookie packed with chocolate chips and a hint of vanilla.

name: Lemon Tart
description: Tangy lemon curd in a buttery crust, topped with powdered sugar.

name: Gluten-Free Brownie
description: Fudgy gluten-free brownie made with almond flour and dark chocolate.
